metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: libming 0.4.8 0.4.8 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow. In getInt() in decompile.c unknown type may lead to denial of service. This is a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-9132 and CVE-2018-20427.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
